permission_levels.read_only: Can list directories and read files only
permission_levels.read_write: Full CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)

usage_guidelines.always_check_permissions: Use get_file_info to check permissions before operations
safe_practices: Check permissions with get_file_info before write operations
Use create_dirs: true when creating files in new directories
Prefer specific paths over broad directory access
